resources.string: If you wish to export data to SD card you must grant access to the file system.
Specify a timeout, in seconds, before ping will exit regardless of how many packets have been sent or received.
Time to wait for a response of single ping, in seconds.
The number of data bytes to be sent. The default is 56, which translates into 64 ICMP data bytes when combined with the 8 bytes of ICMP header data.
Set an interval of wait seconds between sending each packet. default=1 second. The fastest interval is 0.2 seconds.
Value of an IP packet represents the maximum number of IP routers that the packet can go through before being thrown away..

Record route(IPv4 only). Includes the RECORD_ROUTE option in the ECHO_REQUEST packet and displays the route buffer on returned packets. Note that the IP header is only large enough for nine such routes. Many hosts ignore or discard this option. NOT ALL ROUTERS SUPPORT THIS OPTION.
Set special IP timestamp options \'tsandaddr\' (timestamps and addresses). NOT ALL ROUTERS SUPPORT THIS OPTION.
Application access system ping with several configuration options. Ping functionality is similar to Unix.\n\nDeveloped by pacmac 2020.
Use host name or full IPv6 address.
Ping log not exported due to ERROR.
